import React from 'react' import numeral from 'numeral' export default function SearchFilters(props) { const { searchFilters, setSearchFilters } = props const { priceInputMin, priceInputMax, sqftInputMin, sqftInputMax } = searchFilters const handleChange = (e) => { const input = e.target.value console.log(input) // price input must be type Number const priceRegex = /^[$0-9\s][0-9,.\s]*$/ const isValidNumber = priceRegex.test(input) console.log(isValidNumber) if (isValidNumber || input === "") { setSearchFilters(prev => { return { ...prev, [e.target.id]: input.replace(/[,$]/g, "") } }) } } // zipcoderadius // beds // baths // sqft // price return (
